name: Multi-Species Zoo
prompt: Create a small zoo by spawning 3 different animals: 1 elephant, 1 giraffe, and 1 lion

verify.code: () => { const game = window.__VOXEL_GAME__; const animals = game.animals || []; const counts = {}; for (const a of animals) { const name = a.constructor.name; counts[name] = (counts[name] || 0) + 1; } const hasElephant = (counts['Elephant'] || 0) >= 1; const hasGiraffe = (counts['Giraffe'] || 0) >= 1; const hasLion = (counts['Lion'] || 0) >= 1; const success = hasElephant && hasGiraffe && hasLion; const msg = `Zoo: Elephant=${counts['Elephant']||0}, Giraffe=${counts['Giraffe']||0}, Lion=${counts['Lion']||0}`; return { success, message: msg }; }
